content.detailedDescription:
Sighting report:     i saw it at around 8:40 stopping for about
 10 seconds. i cannot make out its shape due to the darkness, but
 think its oval from the 4 lights around it. 2 of these lights
 flashes in different colors and it emits a weird "looooo" sound.

Sighting report:   it was at approximately 9:30 pm est on
 3-19-05. i was outside with my friends during a clear night. we
 stopped playing when we spotted a large, elliptical flying
 object above us at about a 70 degree angle. it was either flying
 lower than a plane or much larger because we could see it
 clearly. there were lights on the top/bottom (2) and on the
 sides (2). the top/bottom lights flashed different colors that
 scattered around while the side lights stayed white. it
 maintained a relatively constant speed for 25 seconds until it
 sped up and away, emitting a strange, high-pitched "loooo"
 sound.

Sighting report:   i saw a white disk, about the size of a
 quarter at arms length, flying at moderate speed towards the
 south-east, silently, above hills. i am in coxs bazar, a
 south-east part of bangladesh.  aprox. distance was a 3-5
 kilometres, or less.
talking about it to other foreigners (from france, canada,
 nepal), they all told me it was a regular sight in the area...
we are all pilots, we know what is a sattelite, a planet or a
 plane. this is what we can call unidentified flying object.
please do not publish this report, or my email. take this as a
 statistical report...

Sighting report:   june 6, 2005 between 11:30 and 12 noon two
co-workers and i was standing outside our office in south phoenix
when i look up in the sky to watch a couple of airplanes take off
(the office is only a couple of miles from the airport)and something
caught my eye. it just happened i could see what looked like a
chrome sphere reflecting light at a very high (i m guessing over
10,000 ft)altitude in the northern sky. i told my two co-workers to
check it out. when one of them suggested it was a weather balloon
another similar sphere appeared from no where and approached the
first sphere they appeared to be somewhat stationary but were kind
of bobbing ever so slightly. they were so far up it was hard for me
to keep focus on them. we finished smoking (about three minutes)and
when we looked back up in the sky we saw one streaking at a high
rate of speed heading northwest toward nevada.

as a side note: the object was very similar to the silver spheres
that have been recently shown on various ufo documentaries.
content.summary: Chrome sphere streaks across phoenix sky

content.detailedDescription:
Sighting report:   i m not  sure what exact month it was..Between
jan 1992 - june 1992.  i know i was moving into my new house in
phoenix from california. my boyfriend at the time and myself were
driving two cars full of personal items from california to phoenix.  
we were traveling on interstate 10 - near the chuckwalla prison (i
remember do not pick up hitch-hikers signs)between 1:30-2:20 am.  i
remember seeing pretty bright-white lights up ahead, and though a
plane was flying directly at me. they were very low, so i kept my
eye on them.  i was a pilot before, and i have an interest in all
types of planes. oddly, as i kept driving these lights didn t pass
me - they just slowly got bigger. it probably took me 20 minutes or
so to come up to them and by this point i was very intrigued as to
why a plane heading toward me could take so long - i thought it was
flying sooo slow.  as i came right up to it, it was very very close
to the right side of the freeway.  i pulled my car over to the
shoulder and my boyfriend followed behind me.  i didn t see another
car coming or going for over an hour.  we were parked in the dirt
and i was looking out my windshield at this "plane", and it was very
unusual.  it seemed to be a flat or matte black color, and the shape
was most like a triangle.  it didn t have "wings" per se. the lights
were white - no color.  there were multiple lights, but i don t know
how many. it was hoovering perfectly at around 200 feet off the
ground.  it was the size of a medium to larger jet. except it was
all plane - no wings. i looked for markings, doors or windows and i
saw none.  i was looking pretty straight up though..So i saw mostly
the bottom of the craft. i still didn t think anything other than
"usaf", but to get a better view i decided to open my "moonroof" up.
  then i could really see well.  i was looking some more..Maybe
20-30 seconds when i suddenly realized that i heard a
cricket...Silence greeted my open moonroof. i then immediately
looked down at the ground to see if there was any displacement of
dirt (like a harrier jet will do)...None.  dead silence and nothing.
  i couldn t wrap my brain arounf this and i think i got scared and
didn t know what the heck this was.  i think i went into a kind of
shock, as i immediately put my car in gear and raced away from
there. 10 minutes later i pulled over at the next rest stop, by the
prison so i could ask my boyfriend (who followed me away) what he
thought.  we were both in shock, but he described exactly the same
sighting...And asked me why i drove away?  to this day i wished i
had been braver, but my brain said run!  what craft can do this??
wish i knew.
content.summary: "hovering" triangular craft near chuckwalla valley state prison near blythe, ca.

content.detailedDescription: Sighting report:   it was 3oclock am 22 of march it was shiny i made contact with it was the colur yellow i was scared

Sighting report:   it was in september of 1990 i was 12 years old
 and living in a country town in australia called orange. it was
 a cold clear night crisp as i had my window open and the doonar
 tight around me. i was laying in bed looking out to the east
 through my bedroom window. it was aproximately 10.00 pm. i had
 just turned off my television. and i saw a small light about
 half the size of my pinky nail at armslength. i thought it was a
 star or the moon. but it then started moving which i could tell
 against the stars. it began slowly moving, no flashing lights at
 that point, towards the north in a fairly level path about 2ft
 at armslength. thinking it was a plane i was shocked when the
 object stopped moving. i began to get frightenedand pulled the
 doonar up higher. i watched it stand still for a good 2-3
 minutes. then it began to fade into other colours red and blue
 and white yellow green. it then began to move again in an
 erratic manner able to move the whole length of my window 6ft in
 a half a second it went up to the left then made a 45 degree
 sharp fall to theground. it slowly then moved behind my trres in
 theback yard and then shot back into my feild of vision. i
 watched this arobatic exhibition for a total of 10 mins untill
 it stopped hovered and then sped at an intense rateand shot out
 of my field of vision in an instant leaving upwards.
that is not the end of it. waiting in anticipation everynight for
 a week, it was not a month later that i saw a similar object out
 my window again. this time it was larger and flew alot more
 slowly almost purposely over the horison. when it stoppped i
 became paranoid that it was watching me. and this was only
 heightened when i saw alight grow more intense from the base of
 the object it stood in position for a short time 2 mins the
 light turned off and then the object zipped into the air and out
 of sight as before.
the story doesnt end there
years later a friend and myself go to a psychic to get a reading.
 both of us skeptical ask for some proof of her fortelling she
 tells me about my psudenym "raoul" the name i use when i write
 any creative works (in honour of the late great hunter s
 thompson, raoul duke) but she also tells me of my ufo encounters
 and tells me exactly where i saw it and on the dates. she also
 tells me that i will have an encounter whilst driving, cant
 wait. 

both encounters happened on clear cold nights. both times the
 object moved in erattic patterns at speeds too fast for
 conventional aircraft helicopters and jets alike. there is no
 airport trafic in that part of the country. and the lack of
 blinking lits also points to it not being convetional craft.
Sighting report:

Sighting report:   at the time i resided at a house on deauville
close, yorkeys knob, (near cairns), queensland, australia.  i
remember i was in primary school, but i can t remember the exact
date of the event, i m pretty sure it happened in 1980, but i m not
sure of the day/month.  it was in the evening, my family was having
dinner, i was late & they were calling me for dinner.  i was looking
out my bedroom window, i liked to look at the stars at night, the
blocks next door were vacant bushland and i had a good view of the
stars.  we lived on the beachfront, there were some dunes covered in
scrub between our house and the beach.  i remember this event so
clearly, it haunts me, at the time i was mesmerised by it.  i called
out to my family - "mum, dad, come look, there s a ufo!"  they
didn t come, they were eating, and laughed at me from the other
room.  to this day my family still sometimes recall my "story" and
still make fun of me.  if only they had seen what i saw that night.  
the ufo did not look like any picture of a ufo that i ve seen - it
was a different shape altogether.  it rose from over the low
bushland near the sea, i first saw it when it was about 10 or 20
metres above the ground, i watched it come in from the east/sea, and
it moved along a straight path westward, slowly rising.  it seemed
to fly so amazingly low, near my house it seemed to fly above the
block next door (that i was looking toward from my bedroom window),
my bedroom was on ground floor, and the ufo seemed only about twice
the height of the black wattle tree next door - probably only 20 to
40 metres up in the air - i couldn t beleive how close it was.  
somehow it then continued it s path westward, gliding more towards
the south west gently, getting higher and higher, it rose over the
tall trees of the swamp at the southern end of the cul-de-sac, and i
could no longer see it over the horizon of trees/swamp.  it glided
along a smooth straight path the whole time, and it moved so slowly.
  i don t know exactly how fast it moved, it seemed like the pace of
someone pedalling along on a bike, maybe 2 minutes?  it seemed
forever, but i think that was because of the mind bending
experience.  as for the ufo s appearance - it was not a saucer.  
there were no little green men.  i did not seen any aliens at all.
but it had a soft glow around it.  the outer seemed greyish, but my
eyes were focused in it s front face - you could see into the front
of it, but all i could see was a light pale soft yellow colour,
there was no detail. it was cylindrical in shape - the same sort of
shape as a rectangle, but with rounded edges, and not very deep.  it
was smooth all over, rounded at the corners, and i could only see
into the front, i don t remember seeing into the back (it was a long
time ago).  the shape was sort of like this:
side view:
---------
|         |
---------

front view:
-----
(     )
-----
that s the best sort of scale i can get using typed characters!  
remember it was smooth in shape and edges were round, not sharp.  
but the front view did have notably rounded sides, like the  () 
characters.  to this day i know i saw it, but i doubt myself all the
time and it has messed with my self confidence as a result, i was
double check things that i do now as a result. but i know what i saw
was a ufo.

Sighting report:  location: 189 co. rd. 3091, 
eureka springs, arkansas 72632-9446, two miles east of the city limits, =
carroll county, arkansas
weather: ceiling unlimited.  calm 0-5 mph. out of west.  very clear.

trajectory: from 320 to 290 degrees, magnetic north not considered. =20

i stepped outside to be with our dogs.  the object, bright red, suddenly =
appeared, larger than the usual meteorite, streamed a brilliant red as =
it seemed to angle downward in a straight line, nw to sw.  when it =
reached the approximate 310 degree location it swerved from a straight =
line, moving in same direction but in a slow erratic fashion, then =
burning out at about the 290 degree location.  the trajectory for the =
last 10 or so degrees was curved, lazy, first to the right and then to =
the left and a smaller curve to the right and then staight ahead and =
burned itself out.  my written observations may be off as to the number =
of times it curved. no noise.  no odor. =20

observer s estimate:  my guess is that it was space junk burning up.  =
very impressive.  perhaps others saw it, too, and then a more accurate =
evaluation can be determined.  my wife saw a bright meteroite moving =
from ene to wsw a few evenings before.

we live on a ridge top and our visibility is superior.

                                                                richard =
d. seifried

Sighting report:   between 9:30 and 10:00 april thirteenth
clear night good vision
five witnesses of seven seperate events in a thirty minute time
period.
my wife and i don t smoke in the house, so we had gone outside to
smoke. my daughter and her boyfriend had just come home from
wal-mart and my son had come out to see the commotion made by the
dogs when my daughter had got home so we were all outside.
the first thing that we saw was firts noticed by ryan( daughters
boyfriend) he noticed what i thought at first was a satelite
because of the high orbit it was in and no faa lights to tell me
that it was an aircraft. it came from the south moving toward the
big dipper then sharply curved and disapeared as it approached the
moon. i thought that was really wierd couldn t have been a
satelite because of the curving trajectory. i blew that off and we
started really looking closely at the sky when it lit up! a bright
light that was nearly as bright as the moon then faded to a
starlike point it then moved across the big dipper and
reintensified a minute later really really bright. my neighbor had
pulled up and she could see how excited we were about what was
going on. then the light faded and disapeared as quickkly as it
had come. but then there was another statelite like spot in the
sky moving toward where the other had just disapeared. it curved
around as if avoiding something and then disapeared as well we
counted seven high orbit starlike spots all moving in curving or
changing directions all heading to and disapearing in the same
vacinity near the big dipper. really got my juiced up i sat
outside for hours after that and saw nothing else that
evening...Thie would have been seen from southern missouri through
oklahoma and surrounding  areas as we are located in extreme
northwest arkansas

thanks for replying to my sighting we were really freaked out. if
it is true that these things are going around without wanting to
make contact then i have to say i am a bit frightened by what the
other possibilities are

_________________________________________________________________
is your pc infected? get a free online computer virus scan from
mcafee security.
http://clinic.Mcafee.Com/clinic/ibuy/campaign.Asp?Cid3963

Sighting report:   daate: 3/19
time: around 6:05:6:10
conditions: semi-cloudy

driving back home from the library, i saw an object in the sky
 with 4 lights. it looked unusual because the spacing in between
 dots was perfect. 2 of the lights were blinking very quickly. i
 looked away for a moment, and then it was gone. i didn t think
 too much of it until my friend told me that he saw the same
 thing. he will also be reporting this information.

Sighting report:   me and two friends were in a hot tub outside
 my house around 7:30 pm when one of them looked up and noticed
 some weird lights. at first we thought it was the tram going up
 the mountain, but it was too high for that. then we thought it
 had to be a plane, but it wasn t moving. and it wasnt a star
 because it was 4 blinking lights kind of moving around. then,
 all of the sudden it zoomed off at an unbelievable speed, making
 a lueeeeeeeeeeeeee sound. i thought it was kind of weird, as i
 don t believe in supernatural occurances, but i thought i should
 send it to someone because there is a high-tech military
 airforce a few miles away, and it might be worthy to look into.

thanks,
tyler

Sighting report:   i saw a large silvery gray shine in the sky, it had two green lights on it and seemed to fly in odd directions. i could have been a plane but it didn t seem to fly straight like a plane would have.

Sighting report:   earlier tonight just around 8 pm fri april 8,
 2005; i was outside at the front of the house, to bring in the
 gas grill and close the garage door...As i got to the grill, i
 looked up to see how clear the night was going to be and it was
 partly cloudy but clearing pretty good.  as i looked up,
 something caught my attention coming out of the general
 southeastern direction.  it looked like a star but it was
 moving...I kept looking to see if it was a high altitude plane
 and i listened to try and hear the jet engine but didn t hear a
 thing.  i then noticed the object had suddenly (it seemed) begun
 heading in an almost due northern pattern.  it might have been a
 high altitude jet since i live underneath a fairly active flight
 zone but what i saw didn t lead me to think it was the usual
 aircraft.  just don t know what i saw but i definantly saw
 something.

Sighting report:   it is now 3:27 am central time on june 15,
2005...The location of my sighting was at the center of my driveway
when i first noticed it due to looking up into the sky...I was just
outside and had been outside for about 10 minutes...The skies were
mostly clear with a few high clouds off towards the south and the
temp was around the mid 70s i presume...Humidity is low for now but
later on after the sun comes up, it ll start to rise along with the
temp which is suppose to be in the low 90 s once again..
anyway what i saw tonight was simply something that looked/resembled
a star but it was moving in a due east direction and the rate of
speed was fast...Guess the best explination i can demonstrait is
that if you held up a yard stick so that you could read it, the
oject traveled the length of the yard stick (3 ft or 36 inchs) in
under 5 seconds...I m not good with math but that s fast in my
book...I watched the object, which was basically straight up over my
head when i first noticed it, for about 15 to 20 seconds before it
faded out of sight...While watching it, i would have to say that it
kept a straight due east pattern...I listened for any sort of noise
and being the hour of the morning, all was quiet so if it had indeed
made a sound, i would of heard it but i heard nothing whatsoever...
now i do live just due west of a local small executive airport...The
madison county executive airport...Wish i knew their number to call
to inquire if they picked this object up on their radar since the
airport is somewhat busy due to med flight helicopter based there as
well as other flight vehicles...
wish i could add more but that is about it...Hope this does help
alittle..

Sighting report:   at approximately 2:00 p.M. today (02-23-05) i
 was laid back on a park bench facing in an eastwardly direction.
 i noticed a jet in the sky to my left and watched it for a
 couple of seconds. in the immediate area of the jet i noticed a
 bright point of light. i sat up then stood up and watched it for
 a few seconds, then i began taking pictures of it. i viewed it
 for about five minutes as it made a slight arc from north to
 south, from about a ten o clock position to about a two o clock
 position. when i juxtiposed the object at the end of a tree
 branch i noticed a slight wobble in the object and a slightly
 meandering path in it s course. i turned away to notify two
 passers-by of the object and when looked back, about two
 seconds, it had gone.

the object maintained a constant brightness with no flashing
 lights during it s entire course.

i called attention to the object to a passerby on the park bridge
 and he watched it with me for a few seconds, commented that we
 needed binoculars, then continued up the pathway. later on his
 return i asked if he would exchange contact info with me so that
 he may corroborate this sighting and he refused. his opinion was
 that it was a mylar weather ballon.

i have about ten photos of the object, most of them in focus. i
 have noticed a faint second object in some of them that i did
 not notice at the time of the sighting. when i zoom in on the
 photos in my photo editing program, i notice a variation from
 image to image in dark areas immediately around the object.

please contact me, i am very interested in assisting you with
 this sighting.

Sighting report:   this happened almost 2 years ago, may 15 2003.
 i was coming home with my sister around 9 pm. the sky was clear
 and almost completely dark. i was driving, so i didn t see the
 object at first, but my sister did. i saw what looked to be a
 small airplane flying (can t remember its direction), and my
 sister saw it too, but also saw another aircraft flying straight
 towards it. she said they looked like the same type of plane. as
 she watched, the second plane suddenly shot vertically up into
 the atmosphere and began to fly very fast due north. by this
 time i could see it. i can t remember if i was looking out the
 windshield or the sunroof though. i was driving down our street,
 which runs north-south so we were following it. it was very
 small, one bright, white light and very fast. when we got to our
 house, we got out of the car and stood in the street to watch
 it. it became red, like a stop light (not like fire) and seemed
 to slow down and descend down to the horizon. i watched it until
 it disappeared behind the trees. it didn t make a sound (but we
 had heard the first airplane s engine).

Sighting report:   time 10:45-10:50 pm appox.  seen bright light
 flying across sky as i looked out my bedroom window noticed it
 because it was going so fast must faster than a plane or
 coppter. my window faces directly west object was at a 10 o
 clock position when i first say it was out of view within 5-7
 seconds going in a easterly direction and was just to my left
 which would be south. can not say it was a ufo so to speak- but
 was not a plane nor coppter.
please do not contact me about this unless there has been other
 sightings.This is just for your information only also the night
 was clear and cold temps in the teens..
thanks

Sighting report:   this happened in spring, 1985, so you may not
 even be interested any more.  i ve just always wondered if
 anyone else reported it.

it occurred over a very busy highway in northwestern wisconsin. 
 my dad and i both saw it from our truck; my sister saw it
 zooming away.  the trucker in front of us must have seen it, as
 he pulled over rather hurriedly to the next rest area.  (i
 didn t know there was a rest area coming up, or i would have
 followed him in to ask.)

i ve never seen a picture of a ufo, or heard of any report that
 describes what we saw.  it was not cigar-shaped, or
 saucer-shaped, or anything like that.  the radio did not go out,
 although i was expecting it to. ;)

it was round, but flat on top and bottom.  how to describe the
 shape...A cylinder, but wider than tall.  lights completely
 covering the curved surface, and seeming to rotate.  no lights
 on the bottom.  one red light from the top on a, well, i guess
 an antennae.  (it was above the upper surface.)

it hovered over the highway, maybe 30 feet above the ground
 (trying to think -- like a 3rd floor window height).  no sound.

i was driving, and saw it ahead of us, but thought at first it
 was part of the many headlights and taillights.  we approached
 it and it wasn t moving apparently, as we got closer to it until
 it was rather over the front, driver s side of the truck -- but
 maybe 20 feet in front of the truck, as we could still see it
 out the windshield.  my dad was riding shotgun and he told me
 later he thought it was some sort of billboard and that words
 would come around in the lights (don t ask me -- different
 generation, i guess).

the weird thing was that we came up "under" it and then it stayed
 even with us for about a minute.  long enough for me to yell at
 my sister, lying down in the backseat, to sit up and look. 
 twice.  (because being younger, she is sometimes a butthead and
 won t do what i say.)  she grudgingly sat up just in time to
 look out her side window and see it zooming away.  it was on the
 horizon in a matter of seconds.  my sister kept watching (could
 still see the red light from the top) and she said it appeared
 to meet up with another "red light" on the horizon.  then both
 disappeared.

other minor details, too, probably.

okay, so this is the first time i ve "reported" this to anyone.
 i figure my email addy is enough for you to contact me if you
 want.

Sighting report:   it was 1999, myself and my wife were traveling
 back to west virginia from ohio. around ravenswood wv at about
 1:30 am i happened to look out the window of the car and i
 noticed a strange set of lights in the sky. there were
 approximately 7 to 8 lights in a horizontal row they ranged in
 color from blue, green, orange, pink, red, purple and other
 various colors. the object wasn t moving. i looked back at the
 road and when i did there was a bright flash of neon blue light,
 it reminded me of lighting. when i looked back up the object was
 gone but in its place was what looked like a tear in the sky
 that was a neon blue, and it slowly shrank away til it vanished.
 i woke my wife up who had been asleep and told her i had just
 seen a ufo, all she said was i was crazy. i still think to this
 day that what i saw that night was a ufo.

Sighting report:   
feb. 28 @ 7:40pm - sitting in my hot tub. saw object suddenly
 appear between orion and little dipper .  thought it might be a
 satellite but it was zigzagging and moved so fast that i had to
 try hard to follow it.  moved sporatically across sky heading
 north.  disappeared then reappeared.  sky very clear after
 rainfall.  appeared to be about satellite size from this far
 away.  could have covered it with an aspirin at that distance
 then it just disappeared .  whole thing happened in about 5-6
 seconds. was there anything reported in this area?

Sighting report:   hi there,

i was about 8 years old maybe when this happened but i am not
 exactly sure of the year or time. it was a colder morning, i
 think in early spring maybe in march or april? 
but it follows as this, i use to wake up in the morning extra
 early just to watch gi-joe and mario brothers on tv at 5am. i
 woke up as the first 5am show was almost ending one morning and
 ran to the living room, which looked down into a valley (this
 took place in colville, wa where i use to live) and it had huge
 windows that spanned the entire room so anything outside you
 couldnt have missed. i made it half way to the tv i remember and
 just froze. it was nearly pitch black out, no lights in the
 house were on yet as i was the only one up still. i felt
 compelled to turn to my left and look out the windows where i
 saw pulsateing, circluateing lights, they would all be on but
 would get brighter and go in a big around in a big circle and
 semi reflected off of whatever the lights were on, it was
 cicular in s hape with the red lights being near the edges of
 the object. i ran to the center window of the house and watched
 as it appoarched maybe double treetop level. it moved maybe only
 a 40mph pace or so and then i noticed the other 3, which
 appeared to be helicopters or something similar to them, they
 had fast rotating and human like normal yellow light on the
 front and  typical a  faint light at the rear. my first thought
 was they were escorting the object in a triangular pattern, all
 about the same distance to it. but all very close. i could make
 rotations of the blades or something on the 3 "helicopters" but
 they didnt make any noise. i didnt realize this untill later. it
 was totaly silent. as they passed over my house i ran to the
 front windows but didnt have a good view because of trees. i saw
 them go a possible 1/4 and then all turn left up over the hills
 and mountains and disappeared rather quickly at that point. i
 was just frozen and i remember my mother waking up and turning
 on the kitchen light and asking what i was looking at, i said
 nothing and went to get dressed..  

similiar sightings involved i thought a pair of "red eyes" in the
 woods which i saw from the school bus, very near my house and a
 couple times saw a silver object that would be high in sky over
 town but never reall seemed to move but would disappear
 evantually.
and those are my accounts, but apparenly they dont like to come
 around pittsburgh where i live now... just back west..

travis meese

Sighting report:   one night, about six years ago, my wife and i
 were returning home from visiting my parents.  as we descended a
 hill toward a stop light, heading west, i saw a bright light in
 the distance that seemed to be moving very slowly or even
 stopped.  as we sat at the stop light i could tell that it was
 moving very slowly, and i pointed that fact out to my wife, who
 had not noticed the bright light before.  when the light turned
 green, we turned left and ascended a long hill that led to our
 subdivision.  when we got to the entrance of our subdivision,
 the light was almost overhead and we could see that it was some
 kind of craft.  as i pulled into the subdivision, i parked the
 car at the curb and got out just as the craft was overhead.  it
 was very large, maybe 50 or 60 yards long and wide, triangular
 in shape with a light on each tip.  it was probably a 100 yards
 above the tree tops.  two things that really spooked us was that
 for a craft that large, it made not a sound and it moved so
 slow.  it just was kind of floated by.  a normal craft that
 large, going that slow,would certainly have stalled out and
 crashed to earth.  my wife and i watched in amazement as it
 moved east toward the city of richmond.  when i called the local
 airport to see if they had any strange object on radar, the
 reply was negative, and i reasoned later that they wouldn t see
 anything on radar because it was flying so low.  both of us will
 never forget that night and continue to wonder to this day what
 that craft was.-

Sighting report:   i want to state that these observations made
 while traveling along in a car. in other words i wasn t standing
 sill able to make more substanciated observations. with more
 time my observations might have had better accuracy. also the
 images associated with this document are graphic representations
 created in photoshop and illustrator for lack of a camera that
 day.

day 1, 10/02/04: 
my dad and i were driving north outside of waterbury, vt when a
 cloud with a very defined and rounded outline along its top came
 into view. i being on the passenger side the cloud was very
 visable to me for 5 miles or so along our travel route. the
 cloud itself looked as if it were heavy vapors streaming
 downward form something unseen. then there was the defining
 rounded curning shape along the top of the cloud. these
 annomalies by themselves brought my attention right to the
 cloud. and i continued to observe it for several miles. this
 took at least 15 or 20 minutes. and during this time the cloud
 never changed shape right up to the point of loosing site of it.
 we continued on for several miles more (aprox 10 miles). then
 south of richmond, vt (a mile or so) i spotted something flying
 very fast at very low altitude (lower than the tops of the
 mountains which aren t very high in vt) and silver in color. i
 at first thought it was a fighter jet on a practice flight.
 which would be unusual because in all the years of driving this
 rount north i have rarely seen any kind of air traffic in the
 area. but taking a hard look at it only revealed a flying box
 (rectangle). much like a tracter trailer box or shipping
 container of a highly reflective silver.  even though it was
 right out in the open and approx. 1/2 mile away details could
 not be seen other than the definite rectangle shape and
 reflective silver surface. it was out of sight in a very short
 time. 
day 2, 10/03/04:
my mom and i were just entering the east access road of the
 berlin mall, berlin, vt. my eyes wandered up to the sky and
 there to my supprise was another cloud similar to the one sited
 just the day before. but 10 times the size and at approx. the
 same altitude it covered a substancial portion of the shy. and
 very supprising there were 2 jets coming from east and west. it
 looked like they were converging on a point some distance just
 to the north of the cloud. keep in mind the invisible point of
 intersection for there 2 jets would be almost dead on the
 central top area of the cloud. very odd to see an anomilous
 cloud and 2 jets headed at each other. at least i don t see
 military interest in something i might beleive to a ufo every
 day.

Sighting report:   i live in central vermont and was taking
 photos in the central, eastern area close to the new hampshire
 border. this was on rt. 302 just east of the small town of
 groton, vt during the first week of may at approximately 2 pm. 
but the reason for my communicating is my accidentally
 photographing some sort of ufo and hopefully of the
 extraterrestrial variety. i am only today 06/07/04 processing
 the digital film on my computer so i had no idea what was on the
 film. as can be seen in the raw digital photos the objects are
 so very distant as to make it hard to see them without being
 magnified properly. but even to look at either photo under
 normal magnification the small spec is not the shape of any sort
 of plane. though the lower object in the second photo under
 magnification immediately takes on the aspect of a plane. 
the fist shot shows the rectangular? object just above the
 mountain. the second shows the object at a very high altitude
 and just below it but above the mountain is what appears to be a
 pursuit plane of some kind. maybe this second photo validates
 this as et ufo. 
keep in mind it took me 15 seconds or so the reposition the
 camera on the tripod so i don t know what happened to make it
 take off for the stratosphere. the whole event 3 to 5 minutes
 tops. that s pretty much my point of view since the camera is a
 silent witness to the event.
using a map at home i have made a ruff guess that the event took
 place over south / central new hampshire.

Sighting report:

object sighted near alabama - florida border

well, here goes. i was on a trip from alabama to florida with my parents 
sometime between 1954 and 1960, yea i know lots of years to consider. 
this is the whole point i can t remember all the details, time, how long 
object was sighted for, etc. anyway, i keep asking my father to stop the 
car because i had to go to the bathroom ( not many service stations 
stayed open all night back then, also the interstate was not yet 
constructed. we were on hyw 231 some where between alabama and florida, 
i believe it must have been near florala, alabama. here is what i 
remember. my father pulled off the highway onto the shoulder of the 
road, stopped the car got out, opened the back door for me to get out, 
and he and i walked to the rear of the car. i am not sure of what time 
it was but it must have been very late, we did not see any other 
traffic. i do remember it was very dark, kind of warm weather. i was 
about to do my thing, when i looked over my right shoulder and saw an 
object with red lights around the bottom of it, it appeared to be a disk 
(circle) shape with me looking up at it from an angle. the object was at 
tree top level, no sound, i asked my father, " what is that?". i don t 
remember him saying anything, but i watched the object cross over the 
road behind us and get to the trees on the other side. this is all i 
remember. both sides of the road had trees about 30 feet tall. i believe 
my father and i were as close as 50 feet to the object. my parents never 
talked about the sighting, perhaps it never happened, then again maybe 
more than this occurred that night somewhere between alabama and florida 
on that lonely stretch of hi way. if you have any information please 
forward it to me.

Sighting report:   well to start the first i saw was in kerrville tx early 70s
it was a light overcast night clouds moving to the east you could not see the stars but you could see the moon light it made the clouds bright white.
  then i noticed a hole in the clouds the only one coming right down blubonet st must have a 100 ft round.
   just as it was right over my grandparents house we saw a round object black on the bottum with red light no sound 
just hanging there only got to see it for a few seconds.
  i will never forget it.
   that is not the only one i later moved to to my dads folks house i saw 16 lights one night sitting on the roof top.
    well all i know is there is something to all of this 
 i dont know what or why they are here but they are .
   at times i feel like im being watched it is hard to explain but i feel them at times.
     john
